dialect.name: us
dialect.resource: The operation did not complete successfully.

An unknown error [%ON ERR_NAME%]"[%ERR_NAME%]"[%/ON%] ([%ERR_NO%]) has occured in class "[%ERR_CLASS%]". [%ON ERR_DEF%]The error provider furnished the following, context-specific details: [%ERR_DEF OnRecord="1"%][%DEF_KEY%] = "[%DEF_VAL%]"[%/ERR_DEF%][%ERR_DEF OnRecord="-1"%], and [%DEF_KEY%] = "[%DEF_VAL%]"[%/ERR_DEF%][%ERR_DEF%], [%DEF_KEY%] = "[%DEF_VAL%]"[%/ERR_DEF%].[%/ON%]

The requested error message ([%REQUESTED_CLASS%]:[%REQUESTED_ERRNO%]]) could not be rendered because it could not be compiled. The compilation error received was : ([%TMPL_ERRNUM%]) "[%TMPL_ERRSTRING%]".

The requested error message ([%REQUESTED_CLASS%]:[%REQUESTED_ERRNO%]]) could not be rendered because it could not be merged with its definition set. The merge error received was : ([%TMPL_ERRNUM%]) "[%TMPL_ERRSTRING%]".
